alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 23 at 11:32PM CDT until July 24 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR ALLAMAKEE AND EAST CENTRAL WINNESHIEK COUNTIES... At 1131 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles south of Spring Grove to near Decorah, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Waukon and New Albin around 1150 PM CDT. Lansing around 1155 PM CDT. Harpers Ferry around 1215 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Hanover, County Roads A 52 And X 52, County Roads A 26 And X 6 A, County Roads A 52 And W 60, State Road 9 And County X 20, Waterville and State Road 76 And County X 16. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
